data.description:
Are you ready to start your KUNG FU FITNESS journey today?

With a focused mind and a strong body, embark on the challenge to become the greatest Kung Fu master of all time! Join Crazy Kung Fu to start your training, improve your reflexes, get fit, and become the ultimate Kung Fu force!

It won’t be easy, so keep your wits about you! As you climb the ranks and master new techniques, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges that will push you to your limits—and help you discover new limits you didn’t know you had! You’ll grow stronger and healthier, move on instinct, and anticipate the action ahead of time—you’ll be unstoppable!

changelog.change_log:
- New BRACERS available in the demo! Leave a review on the demo store page and they'll be unlocked in game within 24h. :)

This is a thank you for all the support in the past year, the game has come so far and wouldn't have been possible without everyone training so hard.

- [ FULL GAME ] Complete redesign of Torii Dojo environment. Much brighter, more interesting and highly optimised!
- [ FULL GAME ] New lighting / textures of Cave Dojo and Hall Dojo.
- Improved fidelity of reflective surfaces on bracers, so they feel even better in the various Dojos.
- [ FULL GAME ] New level end for when failing from too many mistakes, so that it's clearer now when this has happened.
- The lower blades on the dummy now have a shorter range, this is to allow for cleaner fluidity between movements.
- Further deep optimisation for both Q1 and Q2 to allow for a much more stable framerate when playing in the highest levels at speed.
- [ FULL GAME ] Added volume control for music (saves between sessions).
- Added reminder during tutorial that it's possible to skip it.
- Fixed tutorial board remaining when starting a level after finishing tutorial in some instances.
- [ FULL GAME ] Fixed multiplier icons not showing when starting the game.
- [ FULL GAME ] Fixed "Retry" panel showing level numbers in Focus mode (there are no levels in Focus).
- [ FULL GAME ] Fixed total score not displayed in some instances in Focus mode.
- Fixed issue where red screen fade would remain on screen if got hit exactly when level ends. 
- Fixed issue where if your score was too big a number it would be displayed in scientific notation (Yes, some of you are THAT good).

- Matching gloves for unlockable bracers!
- Fixed issue with dialogue text not displaying properly in some instances.
- Fixed issue with local scoreboard overflowing!
- Fixed issue with NEXT plank not responding correctly in some instances.
- General quality of life improvements, including performance, storage and textures.

- [FULL GAME] New bracers: Improviser & Legend
- Various texture/model improvements.
- Updated entire text display system so it's easier to read but also performs better overall.
- Update leaderboard panels and display, so the banner color works better with the text, and your name/score is a different color so you can quickly see where you are.

- [FULL GAME] New bracers: Improviser & Legend
- Various texture/model improvements.
- Updated entire text display system so it's easier to read but also performs better overall.
- Update leaderboard panels and display, so the banner color works better with the text, and your name/score is a different color so you can quickly see where you are.

- [FULL GAME] New bracers: Improviser & Legend
- Various texture/model improvements.
- Updated entire text display system so it's easier to read but also performs better overall.
- Update leaderboard panels and display, so the banner color works better with the text, and your name/score is a different color so you can quickly see where you are.

- [FULL GAME] New bracers: Improviser & Legend
- Various texture/model improvements.
- Updated entire text display system so it's easier to read but also performs better overall.
- Update leaderboard panels and display, so the banner color works better with the text, and your name/score is a different color so you can quickly see where you are.

- [FULL GAME] New bracers: Nomad & Royal
- [FULL GAME] Your modifiers will now automatically be saved between sessions.
- [FULL GAME] Fixed issue with Dojo selection orbs not appearing the first time after switching back from passthrough.
- [FULL GAME] Fixed issue with Fight Mode leaderboard score not displaying the right number if player is not in the top 15.
- [FULL GAME] Updated how errors are counted in Fight Mode so that "Too many mistakes" doesn't appear as often. 
- [FULL GAME] Improved models and water in the waterfall cave Dojo.
- Updated texture quality/compression of most materials in game. Check out the title in the intro!
- Optimized system, reducing required storage by about 25%.
- Overall cleanup for performance boost.

- [ FULL GAME] Unlockable bracers! New bracers will be added regularly for a few months that need to be unlocked in at different levels of training.

- [ FULL GAME] New "Bracers" section in the menu under the "DOJO" tab.

- [ FULL GAME] New reward system! Check for the pop up panels that you can smash once you've unlocked something.

- [ FULL GAME] Removed accuracy count bar from the scoreboard when in Fight mode, as this is only valid for Train mode. 

- [ FULL GAME] Fixed issue where Expert level 11 wouldn't unlock in some instances.

- Updated leaderboards layout to be clearer.

- [ FULL GAME] Fixed issue where if using focus mode directly after Expert, precision spheres would spawn. Or was that a feature? I'm not sure, but it doesn't happen anymore. :)

Enjoy the new Ranks, Student.

- [FULL GAME] New Rank system: "Train" is now split into various Ranks, as you finish a Tier in one Rank, you can play it in the next.
The original 3 Tiers are now part of `Apprentice` rank, and currently you can play the next one: `Expert`. This rank includes a new way to play the levels that's more challenging but more rewarding. 

- Updated scoring system: Points are now relative to how close you were to making contact with the dummy arm (block/punch) at the right time. Making contact exactly when it meets the ghost will grant 100% points, the further you are off that, the less points you get. Level passing scores have been updated to match this. 

- [FULL GAME] New menu layout in Train section of the menu to allow for switching between ranks. As well as new colors for each rank.

- [FULL GAME] 22 achievements have been added to the store platform! There are now a total of 34 achievements.

- [PCVR ONLY] [FULL GAME] Fixed issue where after selecting music in the `Extra` section it was not possible to return to mods. 

- Blocking correctly now makes the dummy arm increase speed, rather than slow down. So watch out!

- Punching a blade from behind will not make the blade come back at you (yes that was a thing, but now it's not).

- [FULL GAME] Punch planks to start levels will not appear until a level has been selected for the Mode you are currently viewing. No more accidental tutorial triggering!

- Fixed issue where game wouldn't pause when removing your device from your head.

- Fixed issue where game hands would center in front of you when you press the device menu button.

- [QUEST ONLY] [FULL GAME] Added visual representation of play-space size (from guardian data) in both the starting scene and when selecting Fight mode.

- Stop Xmas tree from being switched out with the lantern every time you load the game (for those of you who want that Xmas feel all year round).

- [FULL GAME] Fixed issue with challenges on menu not displaying properly in some instances.

- [FULL GAME] Fixed issue where going from some menu pages back to Dojo the leaderboards would no longer appear.

🏮Happy Chinese New Year of the Tiger! 🏮

- New in-game score board UI
- In-game score board now also includes an accuracy display meter (0 - 100%)
- Making errors / missing now reduces both your hits and accuracy percentages.
- Dummy arms will always switch to new arm if you miss.
- Removed Xmas tree from spawning when first try game.

- Fixed issue where ghost arm would sometimes not show.
- [FULL GAME] Removed environment selection orbs from appearing when using passthrough.
- Damage indicator for when getting hit in head or body.
- Feedback board is also now updated to new board model.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] Fixed issue where arrows weren't causing any damage.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] New arrow model.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] Added flash from point of origin when arrow is being shot.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] Reset orientation and height of boxes.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] Updated speed and shot interval time.
- [FULL GAME] [ARROW MOD] If arrow is still in the air after the game ends, it will disappear. So you don't get shot in the head in the menu!

- Design update for all dojo environments! Brighter and more peaceful. Train with style! (only one dojo in Demo though!)
- New dojo means new Shifu, pay your respects and train with discipline.
- [FULL GAME] DOJO tab on menu to access an edit mode to move items around, and a new item menu. Special Xmas items inside to kick this off!
- Fixed issue where "Padwork" mod wouldn't registrer right hand punch. (thanks to LetoDK)
- Added the much demanded SKIP plank in tutorial. It's behind you by the way, to the right. (thanks to everyone)
- Quicker load time after punching plank in intro scene.
- [QUEST ONLY] Fixed issue where passthrough wouldn't auto enable if you had it on last time you played. (thanks to 2D3D)

- Updated menu scroll layout, adding a new tab called "Dojo".
- You can now edit your Dojo in passthrough or not from this tab! And this is laying some ground work for another update coming soon, stay tuned. (TheWarKitty knows)
- Fixed padwork does not registrer right hand (thanks to LetoDK)
- Stop plank (behind you) in tutorial (thanks to EVERYONE ^^)
- Remove arrows that point to EXTRA on announcement (thanks to knob2001_Oscar)
- Re-added the effects on impact for blocks and punches that seemed to have vanished when passthrough was released.
- Quicker load time after punching plank in intro scene! That means more time to punch stuff that matters.

v0.85.14: Sorry for the crashes!
The game no longer crashes on Quest 1 and I have also fixed the start up crash in the demo that was happening for some players. Apologies for these issues, implementing the new passthrough feature had a few side effects. I hope you enjoy training whilst keeping on eye on your surroundings!

v0.85.13
- Fixed issue with usernames for leaderboard not loading properly.
- Fixed issue with leaderboard not displaying scores/names correctly.
- Fixed issue with Sidequest not longer displaying achievements and unable to log back in.
- Fixed issue where passthrough color outlines would remain after the level has finished (red or white).

v0.85.12
- Passthrough can now be enabled by selecting `MR`. Once passthrough is enabled you can then select `Edit` to move some of the virtual items around your physical space. Build your own dojo! This is just this start. Much more to come with these new features!
- Updated the titles during intro scenes.
- Updated various sounds.
- Optimised all scenes in terms of assets / textures and scripts. Things are clearer and run more smoothly overall!

v0.85.13
- Fixed issue with usernames for leaderboard not loading properly.
- Fixed issue with leaderboard not displaying scores/names correctly.
- Fixed issue where passthrough color outlines would remain after the level has finished (red or white).

v0.85.12
- Passthrough can now be enabled by selecting `MR`. Once passthrough is enabled you can then select `Edit` to move some of the virtual items around your physical space. Build your own dojo! This is just this start. Much more to come with these new features!
- Updated the titles during intro scenes.
- Updated various sounds.
- Optimised all scenes in terms of assets / textures and scripts. Things are clearer and run more smoothly overall!
